messages.message: Who would be in charge of GCloud resources for training machine learning models?
Cc @vineeth , "Need an instance with 24GB RAM and around 8GB GPU to train a DL model, for document classification. We are planning to develop a document embedding model."
And also would love to design a process for creating and deleting these resources!

Sure we have not added bespoke instances in past. Will need more context on which of our service needs to be run on this instance, how do you do the training. We can build a repeatable process based on that
The training might be done using variety of frameworks: pytorch, tensorflow mxnet, hugging-face transformers etc. For the particular case I'm working on it uses pytorch + hugging-face transformers
@vineeth  how do you plan to run model training on this machine you want to add? Is this via an existing IB machine. please feel free to setup some time with me on this
Sure @sudeep I will mark sometime on your calendar
